details.division_bench: Division Bench-II comprising of Hon'ble Shri Justice Sheel Nagu & Hon'ble Shri Justice Virender Singh
details.single_bench_vii: 10:15 AM on 01-04-2023 for hearing matters as per Roster/Assignment

details.Reason for Closure: Due to administrative exigencies, functioning including e-filing of High Court at Bench at Gwalior as well as its Registry shall remain closed.
details.Official Notice: This is for information to all concerned.
details.Signatory: BY ORDER OF HON'BLE THE CHIEF JUSTICE (RAJENDRA KUMAR VANI) REGISTRAR GENERAL

name: Modification of the present Roster / Notification

details.Matters mentioned in the Roster / Notifi: Repeat / Bail Applications u/s 438, 439, Miscellaneous Criminal Cases filed u/s 482, Applications u/s 389, Criminal Revision filed u/s 397(1) and/or 401 of the Cr.P.C.
details.Application Procedure: All matters tied-up with Hon’ble Judges will not be placed before Hon’ble the Chief Justice for nomination of the Bench.
